name: @ai-s-tools/git-runner
description: Automated Git Operations Tool for Multi-Repository Projects with AI-powered commit messages

scripts.pkg:build: npm run build && npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:macos && npm run pkg:windows
scripts.pkg:linux: npm run build && pkg dist/git-runner.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output binaries/git_runner-linux
scripts.pkg:macos: npm run build && pkg dist/git-runner.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output binaries/git_runner-macos
scripts.pkg:windows: npm run build && pkg dist/git-runner.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output binaries/git_runner.exe

author: AI-S-Tools
